General.Name: Apple Flavor&Fragrance Grp
General.Description: Apple Flavor & Fragrance Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of flavors, fragrances, and food additives in China. It offers food flavors, including dairy, ice cream, beverage, confectionery, savory, bakery, and snack related flavors; and fragrances for use in personal care, oral care, home care, and candle and air care products, as well as in perfumes. The company also manufactures aroma ingredients, such as synthetic aroma chemicals, natural extracts, and fermentation natural chemicals. In addition, it offers food ingredients, such as dairy products, chocolate and cocoa products, fruit products, flavors and fragrances, breads, desserts, and other products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No.733, Gao Ping Road, Shanghai, China, 200436
